overview: Prior to joining the company Mr. Selin worked for a narrowcasting media company, designing, implementing and managing scalable content distribution and management infrastructure capable of handling tens of thousands of locations while remaining economically sound. System implementation included usage of modern communication carriers: satellite (one- and two-way), terrestrial (from dial-up to fiber-optic) and cellular. Educated at the Moscow Aviation Institute, Mr. Selin started his engineering career at Russian National Space Mission Control Center and continued on the multimedia and video industries. Mr. Selin brings 26 years of computer, software and networking engineering experience.
